productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: This deep hair conditioner intensely conditions very thick, coarse, dry hair for lasting moisture and frizz control See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shampoo Gently cleanses and moisturizes very dry, thick, coarse hair leaving it extremely moisturized, soft and shiny. Conditioning Balm Intensely conditions very dry, thick, coarse hair leaving hair hydrated and healthy-looking. Deep Treatment Delivers intense conditioning and restores manageability to very dry hair. Leave-In Cream Penetrates the deepest levels of the hair fiber for hours of moisture and frizz control.

Can this be used on color-treated hair? Yes, it is suitable for color-treated hair. Is this good for curly hair? Yes, it is suitable for curly and coily hair. Is this product vegan? Yes, it is vegan. Did the Biolage Professional packaging change? Yes, as of 2022 we have a new look with the same iconic formula. It’s the same great performance you know and love, now with a refreshed look! Are all Biolage Professional products sold on Amazon.com authentic and official? Yes, Amazon.com is an authorized retailer and only sells authentic Biolage Professional products.

Commitment to Sustainability From formulas to packaging, all of our products are produced through responsible manufacturing and green science. Sensorial Experiences Iconic uplifting fragrances act as a meaningful emotional trigger that represents a moment of small indulgence, escape and revitalization. Innovation in Conditioning Biolage was the first brand to introduce a silicone-free conditioning balm and the first to teach stylists the benefits of reverse washing. Cruelty Free All Biolage products are now officially cruelty-free. The brand has been given the Leaping Bunny stamp of approval by Cruelty Free International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives your whole family GORGEOUS HAIR
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this line!!!😻😻 It will give you the most beautiful hair!! &&I have ordered from Amazon for the last 6years at least &it has always been consistent; REAL PRODUCTS; the real brand &high quality;; exactly what I expect EVERYtime!! Give it a try!!😻😻💙I’ve used Biolage products since I was a child && it is always consistent quality; very gentle;; but does a fantastic job at giving you clean, soft, BEAUTIFUL hair!! && the smell is AMAZINGG!!The Biolage Line has this classic; unique scent I am obsessed with!!!😻 It’s also the same scent for most of the products (or just slightly different) &&it’s always been THE SAME... it reminds me of being little &&my mom washing my hair with me😸or doing deep condition treatments at sleepovers w/girlfriends (sorry to be so corny😝💙)But I just LOVE IT!! every time I use BiOlAGE; I just get this flood of pretty smell; good feelings && it just makes me happy! It’s like the old Herbal Essence commercials!! 😹😹😸 ok back to the review!!I have the MOST trouble with my hair!! I have mostly straight; fine blonde hair;; it tends to be dry &difficult.. It’s VERY very fine; but I have a ton of it! So it gets super tangles &hair falls && of course by the end of the day; it’s also oily/greasy at the roots already!!!Usually if my ends are soft my roots are greasy!! ORR..it will get weighed down feeling; &heap together with this sticky feeling;;; like every hair wants to grab each other at the ends.. it just won’t be soft &silky unless it’s JUST the right balance &&products!I also have to switch products & circulate my shamp//condish every few days; or my hair gets used to it &&it stops “working” (anyone else out there?!?!!😿🙋‍♀️🙋) SOO;; trust me when I say I have tried EVERY-THINGG!!! &&trust when I say I would KNOW the difference of authentic product!! In my experience you DEF DON’T have to be sketched to buy off of Amazon!!I don’t love any other product as much as Biolage &&Bio’s “Hydra-source”!!I have used a lot of different formulas: FiberStrong repair(6/10)(scent is💯);; the Exquisite Oil(now it’s called something else?)(8/10); && the color care(9/10)(&others) but the original Hydrasource has always been my favorite! Its the most soft & SOO silky;; even after using Lanza for years! I still like it best!!I switched from the Lanza Healing Moisture//Healing Strength(in summer) to Biolage (it also helps it’s literally HALFthe price! TWICE the softness &3x the scent!)The original Hydrasource is also available but I decided to give the “Ultra Hydra-source” a try && I’m super stoked I did! I LOVE IT!!!! I can’t say that enough!!The formula really is different in my opinion.. it seems much “creamier” in consistency; but the conditioner feels lighter;; almost like fluffy feeling when you apply.. It is silky as it rinses &&it doesn’t seem to want to tangle as much!.. BUT it doesn’t weigh me down like some of the more “moisture//oils” shamp/condish products or like the all natural/organic products do!I have been using this steadily for about 5/6mo now &&I think I’ll only get the “Ultra”now on!!! I normally wash my hair every day;; but I have been wash training to go down to 2-3days.. i can really tell a difference in my ends.. My roots don’t get as greasy as quickly && the ends are staying soft... usually by the end of the day/day 2 I’d have dry straw ends.. it’s improving every day but you will see a MAJOR DIFFERENCE in ONE WASH!!!Give this a try because:(1) It does NOT weigh your hair down!!! if you have fine hair;; especially if you have lots of hair(like me) or thick hair it will keep your ends soft & hydrated feeling until the next wash!(2) I can tell the difference in ONE wash! I use other moisturizer combos but this is my favorite;; it’s so silky immediately! my hair feels like silk most of the day! You can feel it even while rinsing!!(3) it’s easy on sensitive skin!! My whole family uses it! My son is 8&has VERY SENSITIVE skin && he has no problem with it! I usually use all natural for him;; but tried it while we were out && it made such a difference in his tangles! He has long; fine blonde hair like me && it gets so tangled && I love this for him so much it’s now what he uses!&&it smells sooooooo GOOD!!I use this on me but I mainly bought the “ultra rich” version for my husband to try.. he always complains that nothing works for his hair.. he has very thick dark blonde hair that tends to frizz (or “puff up” in his words) bc it’s between waves/curly/straight.. so for years he washes 1x/week.. I told him that’s gross && I’d find him something that worked! This Made his hair smooth; but without being “puffy”/floaty/ in his face &&without making it greasy or oily looking/feeling on his scalp.. he has sensitive skin also && we have been using mainly all natural products since our son was born &&for the last 2years I’ve tried almost EVERYTHING ON THE MARKET to find something for him... organic/natural and salon or drugstore products... he liked Biolage before but it wasn’t quite right..the “ULTRA HydroSource” is the winner!!!He is so glad I found him this! Thank goodness!! We all have long hair that tangles easily and it really helps!**We also use the Hydrasource Leave-in**moisturizer &detangling spray && it’s AMAZING if you have kids!! I water mine down as it’s a bit thick && a little too rich for me.. either with wet hands or add water straight to the bottle as it gets used! I have gotten in a routine where I feel like I NEED it! I use straight away after washes before I even towel dry my hair! That way it soaks in but it won’t get too much on too thick!I know this is crazy/stupid long!! BUT I have had such a hard time with my hair especially after having my first baby &&as I get older!(just turned 30!) SO I told my story on the chance someone out there is like me&& needs help & hope!! So I truely hope my review & story helps someone else out there; who has as much trouble as I have;; find this product &it works as well for you as it does for me &&my family!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very thick consistency. It leaves my dry, dry hair really soft without using a lot of product. It's spendy, but worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Matrix Biolage Hydrasource
reviews.reviewText: Loved. Great shampoo and conditioner balm. Smells great and the performance is very exceptional 👌 leaves my hair soft and manageable. Makes a great detangler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Conditioner for my Hair
reviews.reviewText: This product works great for my type 2C hair. It keeps my curls feeling light and clean and not too frizzy. The scent is quite strong (in a good way) and lingers well throughout the day. I struggle with an oily scalp, not not with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I purchased the items several times. This is a good price amount of technical.
reviews.reviewText: This product leave your hair, feeling soft and moisturized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how moisturizing this is. I use once or twice a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for after bleaching hair
reviews.reviewText: My hair felt really dry after bleach wash and i was iffy about buying due to price. But as a first timer this brought my hair back to life. It smells awesome and left my hair feeling soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great conditioner. Good value. Works great.

I have fine but compromised hair, and I need a good moisturizing treatment for my dry split ends an this is lovely, less knots and smoother ends with a nice healthy shine…I like how it isn’t overly scented but still has a slight clean soapy fragrance

reviews.reviewTitle: Un excelente acondicionador para cabello largo
reviews.reviewText: Este es un producto excelente, ayuda desde su aplicación a desenredar y a suavizar el cabello, aún en sus días más rebeldes.

I bought this to go with the hydrasource shampoo and the duo works great. I've tried many different products to re-hydrate and smooth my thick, coarse hair and this is, by far, the best. My hair feels healthy right down to the ends which is amazing considering I also use a flat iron to style it. It even has a nice, light scent that doesn't linger. If you want a hydrating product that doesn't make your hair feel heavy, this is a must try.

While I like Biolage hair products, they just don't seem to work on my thick hair. Shampoo is great but I can't seem to find a conditioner that can tame the frizzies. I've tried several different Biolage conditioners with no luck. Good news is, the texture of my hair is soft and detangles easily. So I can't knock the product.
Got this large size for $39. Purchased a much smaller size from my hair dresser for $25. Great value, and very Moisturizing.
